// Generated by GitHub Copilot
~~ Mashed Potatoes ~~
1 1/2 pounds russet potatoes, peeled and cut into 1-inch pieces
1/2 cup milk
1/4 cup butter
1/2 teaspoon salt
1/4 teaspoon pepper

Place potatoes in a large pot and cover with water. Bring to a boil and cook until tender, about 15 minutes. Drain.
Return potatoes to pot and mash with a potato masher. Add milk, butter, salt, and pepper and continue to mash until smooth. Serve immediately.
